title: Say I Do at The Padre this February
short_description: Say I Do at The Padre this February 11th or 14th and we'll take care of the rest with this exclusive wedding package organized by Simply Chic Events.
description:
Say I Do at The Padre this February 11th or 14th and we'll take care of the rest! This exclusive $1200 wedding package organized by Simply Chic Events includes the following:

  • Prairie Fire for 1 hour
  • Day of coordinator
  • Brides bouquets & grooms boutonniere
  • DJ for ceremony and 20 edited images
  • Officiant
  • Small cake
  • Discount on a room at The Padre
  • Discount from Enchanted Bridal if they book with us
  • Discount from Friars Tuxedos if they book with us
button_text: Book today through Simply Chic Events - 661.205.2978
